code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [Logistics_DeliveryRoute] --> AppInitialization
    
    AppInitialization --> PerformanceAssessment : Start Performance Monitor
    
    PerformanceAssessment --> DeviceCapabilityCheck
    DeviceCapabilityCheck --> InitialModeSelection
    
    InitialModeSelection --> UltraFastMode : Low-end Device
    InitialModeSelection --> FastMode : Mid-range Device
    InitialModeSelection --> BalancedMode : High-end Device
    InitialModeSelection --> HighQualityMode : Premium Device
    
    state UltraFastMode {Logistics_StockLevel] --> QuarterResolution
        QuarterResolution --> BasicFaceDetection
        BasicFaceDetection --> MinimalProcessing
        MinimalProcessing --> LowBatteryUsage
        LowBatteryUsage --> PerformanceMonitoring
    }
    
    state FastMode {Logistics_Warehouse] --> HalfResolution
        HalfResolution --> FaceDetection
        FaceDetection --> BasicNSFWDetection
        BasicNSFWDetection --> ModerateBatteryUsage
        ModerateBatteryUsage --> PerformanceMonitoring
    }
    
    state BalancedMode {Logistics_TrackingNumber] --> FullResolution
        FullResolution --> CompleteFaceDetection
        CompleteFaceDetection --> FullNSFWDetection
        FullNSFWDetection --> GenderClassification
        GenderClassification --> OptimalBatteryUsage
        OptimalBatteryUsage --> PerformanceMonitoring
    }
    
    state HighQualityMode {Logistics_FleetManagement] --> EnhancedResolution
        EnhancedResolution --> AdvancedFaceDetection
        AdvancedFaceDetection --> EnhancedNSFWDetection
        EnhancedNSFWDetection --> DetailedGenderClassification
        DetailedGenderClassification --> ContentDensityAnalysis
        ContentDensityAnalysis --> HighBatteryUsage
        HighBatteryUsage --> PerformanceMonitoring
    }
    
    PerformanceMonitoring --> ContinuousMonitoring
    
    state ContinuousMonitoring {Logistics_Warehouse] --> CPUUsageCheck
        CPUUsageCheck --> MemoryUsageCheck
        MemoryUsageCheck --> BatteryLevelCheck
        BatteryLevelCheck --> ThermalStateCheck
        ThermalStateCheck --> NetworkLatencyCheck
        NetworkLatencyCheck --> PerformanceDecision
    }
    
    PerformanceDecision --> MaintainCurrentMode : Performance Good
    PerformanceDecision --> DegradePerformance : Performance Issues
    PerformanceDecision --> ImprovePerformance : Resources Available
    
    state DegradePerformance {Logistics_DeliveryRoute] --> ReduceDetectionFrequency
        ReduceDetectionFrequency --> LowerResolution
        LowerResolution --> DisableNonEssentialFeatures
        DisableNonEssentialFeatures --> IncreaseCacheUsage
        IncreaseCacheUsage --> OptimizeMemoryUsage
    }
    
    state ImprovePerformance {Logistics_StockLevel] --> IncreaseDetectionQuality
        IncreaseDetectionQuality --> HigherResolution
        HigherResolution --> EnableAdditionalFeatures
        EnableAdditionalFeatures --> ReduceCacheDependency
        ReduceCacheDependency --> EnhancePrecision
    }
    
    DegradePerformance --> AdaptiveAdjustment
    ImprovePerformance --> AdaptiveAdjustment
    MaintainCurrentMode --> AdaptiveAdjustment
    
    state AdaptiveAdjustment {Logistics_Warehouse] --> ApplyChanges
        ApplyChanges --> TestNewSettings
        TestNewSettings --> ValidatePerformance
        ValidatePerformance --> UpdateConfiguration
    }
    
    AdaptiveAdjustment --> ContinuousMonitoring : Return to Monitoring
    
    %% Emergency scenarios
    ContinuousMonitoring --> EmergencyMode : Critical Performance Issue
    
    state EmergencyMode {Logistics_TrackingNumber] --> MinimalDetection
        MinimalDetection --> CriticalFeaturesOnly
        CriticalFeaturesOnly --> MaximumCaching
        MaximumCaching --> EmergencyOptimization
        EmergencyOptimization --> GradualRecovery
    }
    
    EmergencyMode --> ContinuousMonitoring : Performance Recovered
    
    %% User-triggered changes
    ContinuousMonitoring --> UserModeChange : User Changes Settings
    
    state UserModeChange {Logistics_StockLevel] --> ValidateUserChoice
        ValidateUserChoice --> ApplyUserSettings
        ApplyUserSettings --> WarnIfIncompatible
        WarnIfIncompatible --> AcceptOverride
    }
    
    UserModeChange --> ContinuousMonitoring : Settings Applied
    
    %% Battery-specific optimizations
    ContinuousMonitoring --> BatteryOptimization : Low Battery Detected
    
    state BatteryOptimization {Logistics_TrackingNumber] --> ReduceProcessingFrequency
        ReduceProcessingFrequency --> DisableBackgroundFeatures
        DisableBackgroundFeatures --> MinimizeCPUIntensiveTasks
        MinimizeCPUIntensiveTasks --> EnableDeepCaching
        EnableDeepCaching --> BatterySaveMode
    }
    
    BatteryOptimization --> ContinuousMonitoring : Battery Level Improved
    
    %% Thermal management
    ContinuousMonitoring --> ThermalThrottling : Overheating Detected
    
    state ThermalThrottling {Logistics_TrackingNumber] --> ReduceProcessorUsage
        ReduceProcessorUsage --> IncreaseProcessingIntervals
        IncreaseProcessingIntervals --> DisableGPUAcceleration
        DisableGPUAcceleration --> CooldownPause
        CooldownPause --> ThermalRecovery
    }
    
    ThermalThrottling --> ContinuousMonitoring : Temperature Normal
    
    note right of UltraFastMode
        Basic protection with minimal resource usage
        - Face detection only
        - 224x224 resolution
        - 500ms intervals
        - ~2% battery/hour
    end note
    
    note right of BalancedMode
        Recommended mode for most users
        - Full feature set
        - Native resolution
        - 2000ms intervals
        - ~5-8% battery/hour
    end note
    
    note right of HighQualityMode
        Maximum accuracy and features
        - Enhanced processing
        - Content density analysis
        - 3000ms intervals
        - ~12-15% battery/hour
    end note
